verbs.description: There [V: ’s] [ARG1: no question that the person who brought us to the brink of war was Trump , not Kim] .
There ’s no question that [ARG0: the person] [R-ARG0: who] [V: brought] [ARG1: us] [ARG3: to the brink of war] was Trump , not Kim .
There ’s no question that [ARG1: the person who brought us to the brink of war] [V: was] [ARG2: Trump , not Kim] .
